Review Name: Highly recommended Review Description: My flat is at the floor, it is a challenging task for any AC to maintain the targeted temperature, I was a little worried about how it is going to perform, but it proved to be the best, I won't call it a beast, I will call it an angel instead, coz it does not through air to ones face directly like other ACs,but one can feel the breeze even when the temp. is set at 26. Best one. Go for it without a second thought.
